Replying to @scottw 2019-05-29 14:28
@scottw @Netlify If I get builds which work locally but fail on the Netlify CI, I: 1. Try the Netlify build again with clear build cache (from the deploy admin) 2. Ensure that the versions of node or other environments being used match (https://t.co/bNFVCGnCmU) These often resolve things for me
